pr_title: MINOR: call super.close() when closing RocksDB options

timeline.message: fix: call super.close when closing rocksdb options

timeline.bodyText: Are there any ordering constraints to call the three close methods?
timeline.author: mjsax

replies.bodyText: I don't think it matters in this case as the parent's Options handle isn't actually used. Still, I've maintained the inverse of the initialization order here.
replies.author: rodesai
